plot: In the summer of 2003, John Munro swam 36 hours from Sackets Harbor, New York to Kingston, Ontario to help his wife, marathon swimmer Vicki Keith, raise money for the Kingston Family YMCA's adaptive program for children with disabilities.
title: Penguins Can Fly
plot_es: In the summer of 2003, John Munro swam 36 hours from Sackets Harbor, New York to Kingston, Ontario to help his wife, marathon swimmer Vicki Keith, raise money for the Kingston Family YMCA's adaptive program for children with disabilities.
